name: 2024 Product Roadmap and Strategic Initiatives
content:
2024 Strategic Planning Document

Vision Statement:

To become the leading enterprise collaboration platform by delivering AI-powered productivity tools.

Strategic Pillars:

  1. AI Integration

    • Smart document processing

    • Automated workflows

    • Predictive analytics

  2. Enterprise Security

    • Zero-trust architecture

    • Advanced encryption

    • Compliance automation

Q1-Q2 Initiatives:

  • Launch AI Assistant v1.0

  • Mobile app release

  • Enterprise SSO integration

Q3-Q4 Initiatives:

  • Real-time collaboration features

  • Advanced analytics dashboard

  • API marketplace launch

Success Metrics:

  1. Growth

    • Enterprise customers: +50%

    • User engagement: +30%

  2. Innovation

    • AI feature adoption: 40%

    • API integration usage: 100K/month

Resource Requirements:

  • Engineering headcount: +20

  • Infrastructure budget: $2M

  • Research partnerships: 2-3
